ProductInfo.Features:
High brightness (250 cd/m²) and incredible contrast (1000:1 native, 2500:1 dynamic): For an arresting viewing experience.
1080p display: Provides the highest quality progressive-scan picture possible from a high-definition source.
SRS TruSurround Sound system: Provides a theater-like surround-sound experience, with clearer dialog and the enhanced bass sounds.
Audyssey Dynamic Volume: Set your preferred volume level to make soft dialog clearer, commercials won't blare and sound it will be at it's richest automatically.
Inputs: Include 1 component video (side), 1 PC (rear), 1 PC audio (side), 1 RF (rear) and 3 HDMI (side).
ProductInfo.Name: Insignia NS-22E450A11 22" 1080p HD LED LCD Television
